Address.label: Address
Address.value: 9390 TOWNE CENTRE DRIVE,SUITE 200, SAN DIEGO, California, 92121, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Poseida Therapeutics Inc is a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company focused on leveraging non-viral gene engineering technologies to create life-saving therapeutics for patients with a high unmet delivery technology. It has built a pipeline of autologous and allogeneic chimeric antigen receptor T cell, or CAR-T, product candidates, initially focused on the treatment of hematological malignancies and solid tumours.
